mapper.sql: SELECT od.ORDER_NUM, od.MEMBER_NUM, od.SHOWCASE_NUM, od.NAME, od.SEX, od.COMPANY, od.AREA, od.ID_EMAIL, od.BARCODE, od.ORDER_DATE, od.PHONE, od.ORDER_STATUS, od.BANK_ACCOUNT, od.TOTAL_PRICE, od.PAYMENT_TYPE, od.PAYMENT_DATE, od.PAYMENT_PAYER, sb.SUBJECT, sb.PRICE, sb.SHOW_STATUS, sb.FILE_SAVNAME, sb.START_DATE, sb.END_DATE, sb.ADDRESS2, sb.READCOUNT, sb.ORDERCOUNT FROM "ORDER" od join SHOWCASE sb on od.SHOWCASE_NUM=sb.SHOWCASE_NUM
mapper.select: and od.MEMBER_NUM=#{member_num} order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC
and od.ORDER_DATE=#{order_date} order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC

and od.ID_EMAIL like #{id_email} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC

and od.SUBJECT like #{show_subject} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC

and od.ORDER_STATUS like #{order_status} and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC
and od.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{datepicker1},'YY-MM-DD') and od.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{datepicker2},'YY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 order by od.ORDER_NUM DESC, od.ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" (ORDER_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, SHOWCASE_NUM, NAME, SEX, COMPANY, AREA, ID_EMAIL, BARCODE, ORDER_DATE, PHONE, ORDER_STATUS, BANK_ACCOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, PAYMENT_TYPE) VALUES (ORDER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_num}, #{showcase_num}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{company}, #{area}, #{id_email}, #{barcode}, #{order_date}, #{phone}, #{order_status}, #{bank_account}, #{total_price}, #{payment_type})
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOWCASE SET ordercount = ordercount + 1 WHERE showcase_num = #{showcase_num}
UPDATE SHOWCASE SET ordercount = ordercount - 1 WHERE showcase_num = #{showcase_num}
